* Excellent - a word used to describe something that is of high quality or performance
* Terrible - a word used to describe something that is of poor quality or unpleasant
* Awful - a word used to describe something that is unpleasant or of poor quality
* Worst - a word used to describe something that is of the lowest quality or most undesirable
